pages.text: $(weapon)Looting$() increases the quantity of items dropped by mobs when you defeat them!$(br2)Each level increases the maximum drop count, giving you more loot per kill.

pages.title: What It Affects
pages.text: Looting increases drops from:$(li)Common items (string, feathers)$(li)Rare items (Ender pearls)$(li)Mob-specific drops$(li)Some modded mobs$(br2)$(important)Does not affect$() experience orbs or armor drops.

pages.title: Farming Uses
pages.text: $(li)Enderman farming (pearls)$(li)Blaze farming (rods)$(li)Wither skeleton farming (skulls)$(li)Zombie piglin farming (gold)$(li)General mob farms$(br2)$(o)Essential for efficient mob farms!$()
